question: 学校
sourceMnemonic: A <kanji>study</kanji> <kanji>school</kanji> is obviously a place where people study and learn. In English, that's simply a <vocabulary>school</vocabulary>.
sourceReadingMnemonic: This jukugo word consists of on'yomi readings, except <ja>学</ja> (<ja>がく</ja>) is shortened with a small <ja>っ</ja> to make it <ja><reading>がっこう</reading></ja>.
